item.title: nataliekb on "I'm looking for a survey that investigates the role of librarian in DH projects."
item.dc:creator: nataliekb
item.description:
Replying to @Miriam Posner's post:

Hi Miriam,

Thanks for responding. I'll be very interested to read it when it becomes available. I will email you off list.

Natalie

item.title: Miriam Posner on "I'm looking for a survey that investigates the role of librarian in DH projects."
item.dc:creator: Miriam Posner
item.description:
Hi Natalie,

You have great timing! A team of us here at Emory University worked with the Association of Research Libraries to produce a survey on library-based digital humanities services (a SPEC kit). You can see the survey questions here (PDF). We've just received the responses and are compiling them for ARL. We're submitting the compilation and executive summary to ARL on August 15 for editing and release in fall 2011.

I'm happy to answer any questions you have, either here or off-list.

All best,
Miriam
